baculus

Baculus Build Log

Application Setup

  • get cjdns public address
  • start scuttlebot
    • –host=$cjdns –allowPrivate
  • create an invite with scuttlebot
  • accept invite code
    • ssh "cd ~/scuttlebot && node bin invite.accept $invite_code"`
  • open up patchfoo
